subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Baltimore’s Aubrey Huff hit for the cycle last night, but the Los Angeles Angels got a tie-breaking two-run homer from Howie Kendrick in the ninth inning and beat the Orioles, 9-7.
snippet: Baltimore’s Aubrey Huff hit for the cycle last night, but the Los Angeles Angels got a tie-breaking two-run homer from Howie Kendrick in the ninth inning and beat the Orioles, 9-7.
